meanings.sent1: The sunset was beautifuller than the sunrise.
meanings.sent2: She thought the flowers in the garden were beautifuller than the ones in the park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's attempt at singing was beautifuller than his howling.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautifuller painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow after the storm was even beautifuller than she had imagined.

meanings.sent1: She danced beautifuller than anyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The singer sang beautifuller than she had ever heard before.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated beautifuller than a fancy wedding cake.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone beautifuller than diamonds in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed beautifuller after the rain.
